reviews.review: its a good game or at least it was util it was destroyd by the new design and the fact that i paid to play it but now its free for all
Great game but should not be free
Melhor jogo da historia. Só tinha que tirar os hackers.

Fun game, has lasted against the test of time, a refined craft from an era past. Games simply aren't made like this anymore, which is saddening, although it is in the best interest of this game that it stays that way. Has a lot going for it, but I could easily see a new AAA title sweeping a chunk out of this games population if it is good enough. Unlikely that would happen however. Skins are nice to play with, not that I have much myself. Looking forward to more playtime.

It's a really good game to play with friends.

It's a very good first person shooter in my opinion. It requires extreme precision and accuracy, and some games lack that feature. It also has bhopping enabled which brings a whole community to the community. The community is very big and you're gonna have fun every time you log on if you're good at the game.
